pychell API reference¶

Data¶

class pychell.reduce.data2d.BiasImage(input_file=None, header_keys=None, parse_header=False, output_dir_root=None, hdu_num=0, time_offset=0, filename_parser=None, img_num=None, n_tot_imgs=None)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.RawImage

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) –

  • orientation (str) – The orientation of the echelle orders on the detector. ‘x’ for aligned with rows, ‘y’ for columns. Defaults to ‘x’.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.RawImage(input_file, orientation='x', header_keys=None, parse_header=False, output_dir_root=None, hdu_num=0, time_offset=0, filename_parser=None, img_num=None, n_tot_imgs=None)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage

Base class for a raw, unmodified spectral data image (i.e., not modified other than possible readmath).

Parameters

data_list (list) – A list of data objects.

Returns

The generated data cube, with shape=(n_images, ny, nx).

Return type

data_cube (np.ndarray)

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) –

  • orientation (str) – The orientation of the echelle orders on the detector. ‘x’ for aligned with rows, ‘y’ for columns. Defaults to ‘x’.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage(input_file, orientation='x')¶

Bases: object

A base class for a spectral echelle image.

input_file¶

The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

Type

str

base_input_file¶

The filename of the corresponding file with the path removed.

Type

str

orientation¶

The orientation of the echelle orders on the detector. ‘x’ for aligned with rows, ‘y’ for columns. Defaults to ‘x’.

Type

str

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) –

  • orientation (str) – The orientation of the echelle orders on the detector. ‘x’ for aligned with rows, ‘y’ for columns. Defaults to ‘x’.

correct_readmath(data_image)¶

Corrects the NDRS, BSCALE, and BZERO. image_returned = (image_read_in - BZERO) / BSCALE

Parameters

data_image (np.ndarray) – The data image.

Returns

The corrected data image.

Return type

data_image (np.ndarray)

static generate_data_cube(data_list)¶

Generates a data-cube (i.e., stack) of images.

Parameters

data_list (list) – A list of data objects.

Returns

The generated data cube, with shape=(n_images, ny, nx).

Return type

data_cube (np.ndarray)

parse_image(hdu_num=0, correct_readmath=False)¶

Parses the input file for the image only. It’s assumed the header has already been parsed.

Parameters

  • hdu_num (int) – Which header data unit the desired image is in, default to 0.

  • correct_readmath (bool) – Whether or not to correct the NDRS, BSCALE, and BZERO from the header.

Returns

The data image, with shape=(ny, nx)

Return type

data_image (np.ndarray)
